text: Doing ok thanks and the football definitely helped.
author: policytessa

text: What better way to recover from surgery. Lying in a hospital bed watching @England play football.
author: policytessa

text: Not sure until mid April apparently. But then who knows when Brexit will actually happen.
author: policytessa

text: Chair arrived today ready for when I come home after my operation- thanks to @ParkFurn for the loan until ours arrives from Germany.
author: policytessa

text: Impossible to get through on phone and online account doesn’t recognise season ticket so can’t use that either! About to give up and not bother with a season ticket at this rate!  Not good enough #BristolCity
author: policytessa
